 2020-04902020-06-25ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectStandards for Work-Integrated Learning Activities Regulations
PrecisSTANDARDS FOR WORK-INTEGRATED LEARNING ACTIVITIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that students in work-integrated learning receive certain labour standards protections; and (2) foster an environment where employers, students and educational institutions can leverage work-integrated learning opportunities more confidently.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0145 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
